summary: A large dungeon mod consisting of cave's, exterior world and csatle interiors. A continuation of my previous mod - Henriks Tomb
descriptionHtml:
This is the final part of my Larry's Legacy dungeon series.

You must find your way to Deepcut cavern which is close to Glenmoril Coven (South-west), battle your way through the cavern to get to featherbrook castle and take out the ruthless bandit boss!!
You'll even pick a new follower along the way if you keep your eye's open.

Word of advice..bring plenty of health potion's coz this can get real tricky real fast, I had alot of fun testing this mod..as it's been a while since I got killed by bandit's :) note: I tested this mod using a level 45 character with many other mods installed including PISE which definitely helps to make things more interesting.

This still needs to be cluttered in many places and is by no means finished but the dungeon areas are up and running just don't expect to find much help along the way in terms of potions.

Its taken along time to get to this stage because of real world work and all that boring stuff so I thought i'd upload it for you as is..just to get a feel of what you guy's think and want me to add/change.

The Areas are fully navmeshed however I have had issues with followers not following into some areas only to reappear in other's, and then in other test playthrough's there's been no issue so it's a bit of a mixed bag at the moment. I would suggest making this a Solo mission (which is the way I play anyway, it feels much more challenging and fun I think).

This is a simple ESP file so just drop into your data folder and make sure its active before you boot up, I've used only vanilla items so there's no specific requirements, and of course backup your save before trying this out as you should with all mods.

All Comments and suggestions are welcome, hope you enjoy.
author: Greensmirf
